title: [Large-Scale] Emergency Remote Teaching (ERT) Implementation and Evaluation: Mathematics Vocational Training Course

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic mathematical concepts and workplace problem-solving experience
context.additional_context: Need to strengthen remote education response capabilities in emergency situations similar to COVID-19. Potential constraints may include internet connectivity and time limitations for learning

learning_goals: The ability to utilize three or more digital tools for solving math problems in emergency remote teaching environments is assessed
Work-integrated math tasks reflecting blended learning design principles (simplicity, flexibility, empathy) are completed with over 80% accuracy
Technical and learning challenges encountered during ERT can be analyzed, and improvement plans can be proposed
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
